item.title: A Novice's guide to MVP in Android
item.description: The Model-View-Presenter & Android “A design that doesn’t take change into account risks major redesign in the future.” ― Erich Gamma Design patterns is one of those few things that only after you’ve experienced it you realize how you lived without any care about it. And let me get straight to the point , this article is more of a list of very helpful and concise resources than an actual guide (you can find tons of step-by-step guides with code in medium) to the Model-View-Presenter Design pattern/Architecture for android.
